# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards. This exceptional item not only offers superior performance but also adds a touch of elegance to its user's lifestyle. Given its quality and the effort put into its creation, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $150. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $200. I trust that you will appreciate its value and make the most out of your investment. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
